snippet: To get the new MDX with all-wheel drive down by 275 pounds, Acura made trims all over the car, including to the seats, suspension and body.
abstract: Acura made trims all over its 2014 MDX to reduce car's overall weight by 275 pounds to 4,255 pounds.
lead_paragraph: To get the new MDX with all-wheel drive down by 275 pounds, Acura made trims all over the car, including to the seats, suspension and body.

headline.main: The Biggest Losers: How Acura Slimmed the MDX
headline.print_headline: The Biggest Losers: How Acura Slimmed the MDX
